title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a new user can register successfully with valid inputs and receives confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Enter valid user information (name, email, password, confirm password).
Submit the registration form.
Verify registration success message is displayed.
Verify confirmation email is sent to the provided email address.

title: User Registration Validation Errors
description: Check that registration form validation works correctly and appropriate error messages are shown for invalid input.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Submit the form with blank fields.
Verify error messages displayed for required fields.
Enter invalid email format and passwords that don't match.
Submit the form.
Verify appropriate validation error messages are displayed for email format and password mismatch.
Attempt to register with an already registered email.
Verify error message indicating email already in use.

title: Login Success
description: Ensure users can successfully login with valid credentials and reach the appropriate dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Enter valid registered email and password.
Click the login button.
Confirm user is redirected to the appropriate dashboard based on role (client or admin).

title: Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Check system response for login attempts with invalid username or password.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Enter incorrect or unregistered email.
Enter any password.
Click the login button.
Verify error message indicating invalid credentials is displayed.

title: Password Reset Flow
description: Verify users can successfully initiate password reset, receive email, and reset password with a valid token.

steps.description: Navigate to 'Forgot Password' page.
Enter registered email and submit.
Verify password reset email is sent.
Open email and click reset link.
Enter new valid password and confirm.
Submit password reset form.
Verify password reset success message and ability to login with new password.

title: Password Reset with Invalid or Expired Token
description: Ensure password reset fails with an invalid or expired token and displays an appropriate error message.

steps.description: Navigate to reset password page with an invalid or expired token.
Verify error message about invalid or expired token prevents password reset.

title: CSRF Protection Validation
description: Verify that CSRF protection is enforced on authentication and data submission forms.

steps.description: Attempt to submit login, registration, and case creation forms without CSRF token or with an invalid token.
Verify submission is rejected and appropriate error messages or redirects occur.

title: Client Case Creation and Editing
description: Test clients can create new cases, edit case information, and view case details.

steps.description: Login as a client.
Navigate to case management section and create a new case with valid data.
Verify new case is created and listed in dashboard overview.
Open the created case and edit details (e.g., case status, description).
Verify changes are saved and reflected correctly.

title: Case Creation Validation Errors
description: Check that error handling for missing or invalid case creation input fields is functional.

steps.description: Attempt to create a case with incomplete or invalid required fields.
Verify proper error messages are displayed and case is not created.

title: Service Catalog Browsing and Adding Services to Case Cart
description: Verify clients can browse service catalog, add multiple services to the case-specific cart, and persist the cart state.

steps.description: Login as client and open an active case.
Navigate to service catalog.
Add individual services (consultations, doctor visits, transportation) to the case cart.
Verify the selected services appear correctly in the case cart and persist after page reload.

title: Service Request Submission and Admin Approval Workflow
description: Verify clients can submit service requests from their case cart and admins can approve or reject these requests.

steps.description: Client adds services to case cart and submits request.
Verify request status is pending and notification is sent to admin.
Login as admin and navigate to service requests dashboard.
Approve a pending service request.
Verify client receives notification of approval and case status updates accordingly.
Reject another service request and provide reason.
Verify client sees rejection notification with reason.

title: Administrator Case Status Update and Fee Calculation
description: Verify that administrators can update case statuses, and upon case win, contingency fees are correctly calculated and recorded as 25% of compensation.

steps.description: Admin logs in and opens a settled case marked as 'Won'.
Input compensation amount and trigger fee calculation.
Verify fee calculated is exactly 25% of compensation and reflected in case records.
Update case status and save.
Verify updated status is displayed for clients and reflected in admin reports.

title: Secure Document Upload and Validation
description: Validate that clients can upload documents securely with only allowed file types and sizes, and download existing documents.

steps.description: Login as client and navigate to document management for a case.
Upload a document with permitted file type and size.
Verify upload successful and document is listed.
Attempt to upload a disallowed file type or oversized file.
Verify error message and rejection of the upload.
Download an uploaded document.
Verify document downloads correctly with no data corruption.

title: Appointment Scheduling and Management
description: Ensure clients can schedule and view appointments with attorneys and receive confirmation notifications.

steps.description: Client navigates to appointment scheduling.
Select available time, add meeting details, and submit appointment request.
Confirm appointment is created and visible in client and attorney calendars.
Verify notification email is sent to both parties.

title: Internal Messaging System Functionality
description: Validate that clients and attorneys can send and receive messages within the system, including new message notifications.

steps.description: User logs in and navigates to messaging system.
Compose and send a message to another user.
Verify message appears in sender's sent folder and recipient's inbox.
Verify notification alert is received by recipient.

title: System-wide Notifications Delivery
description: Test that system notifications for events (approvals, status changes, settlements) are sent as emails and appear in user dashboards.

steps.description: Trigger important events like service request approval and case status update.
Verify corresponding notifications appear in user dashboard.
Verify notification emails are received by intended recipients.

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify users with different roles (client, admin) can access only their permitted system areas and features.

steps.description: Login as client user and attempt to access admin dashboard and user management pages.
Verify access is denied or redirected with appropriate error message.
Login as admin user and verify access to all admin functionalities.
Verify admin can manage users, service approvals, and system settings.

title: Responsive UI Verification Across Devices
description: Test the application's user interface responsiveness on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices per design specifications.

steps.description: Access client and admin dashboards on desktop screen size.
Verify layout is correct and all components are visible and functional.
Resize or access the platform on tablet-sized viewport.
Verify that UI adapts properly with navigation and content reflow.
Access on mobile device or emulator.
Verify touch controls, menu toggles, and readability meet usability standards.

title: Reports and Analytics Accuracy
description: Verify that reports reflect correct case outcomes and service usage with accurate aggregation and export functionality.

steps.description: Generate reports for cases and service usage over specified periods.
Verify data accuracy against raw records.
Export reports to supported formats (e.g., CSV, PDF).
Verify exported files are complete and formatted correctly.

title: Secure File Upload Malicious Payload Test
description: Check that file upload controls detect and prevent uploading of malicious files or scripts to protect from security vulnerabilities.

steps.description: Attempt to upload files containing scripts, executables, or disguised malware.
Verify uploads are rejected and logged, and no execution occurs on server.

title: Session Management and Logout
description: Validate that user sessions are properly maintained after login and fully terminated upon logout.

steps.description: Login as client or admin user.
Verify session is active and user can navigate protected pages.
Click logout button or link.
Verify session is destroyed and user is redirected to login page.
Attempt to access protected pages after logout.
Verify access is denied and user is redirected to login.
